total_protein.name: Metabolic response to proteins
total_protein.trait_description: Genetic association of various protein metabolism.

saturated+fatty_acid_response.name: Lipid/Saturated Fatty Acid response
saturated+fatty_acid_response.trait_description: Lipid/Saturated Fatty Acid Metabolism is intrinsically linked to genetics. Identifying whether you have a low or high metabolsim can help you make decisions on supplements.

polyunsaturated_fa_response.name: Polyunsaturated FA response
polyunsaturated_fa_response.trait_description: Polyunsaturated Fatty Acid Metabolism is intrinsically linked to genetics. Identifying whether you have a low or high metabolsim can help you make decisions on supplements.

savoury_snack_consumers.name: Snacking pattern
savoury_snack_consumers.trait_description: Genetic liklihood of having multiple small meals during the day.

total_fattty_acids.name: Total fatty acids
total_fattty_acids.trait_description: Genetic association of total fatty acid intake.

endurance.name: Endurance Potential
endurance.trait_description: Genetic liklihood of ability in strenuous sports or other exercises.

power_potential.name: Power Potential
power_potential.trait_description: Hand grip strength is strongly correlated to over-all inrinsic strength capacity. This shows the genetic association of power potential.

reduced_heart_beat_response_to_exercise.name: Reduced Heart Beat Response to Exercise
reduced_heart_beat_response_to_exercise.trait_description: The genetic association between the long-term effect of exercise and its correlation to a decreasing resting heart-rate.

aversion_to_exercise.name: Aversion to Exercise
aversion_to_exercise.trait_description: Genetic liklihood that someone is unwilling to do regular exercise.

potential_for_lean_body_mass.name: Potential for Lean Body Mass
potential_for_lean_body_mass.trait_description: Genetic liklihood of maintaining lean body mass.

obesity.name: Potential for Obesity
obesity.trait_description: Genetic risk of being obese in adulthood.

basal_metabolic_rate.name: Slow Metabolism
basal_metabolic_rate.trait_description: Genetic risk of having a slow metabolsim.

stress_fracture_risk.name: Stress Fracture Risk
stress_fracture_risk.trait_description: Genetic risk of having a stress related bone fracture.

rotator_cuff_risk.name: Rotator Cuff risk
rotator_cuff_risk.trait_description: Genetic risk of achieving an injury to the rotator cuff.

overall_bone_mineral_density.name: Overall Bone Mineral Density
overall_bone_mineral_density.trait_description: Genetic association of bone mineral density as a measure of protection against fracture.
